description: ENHANCING RESILIENCE TO REDUCE VULNERABILITY IN THE CARIBBEAN

subproject.description:
The project's outputs are:
Output 1.  Sustainable netowrk fo real-time decision support centres to facilitate early warning and post disaster recovery established and fully integrated into national and regional planning.

Output 2.  Strengthened national disaster machanisms to incorporate best practices in volunteerism; enhanced institutional capacities; and support to tsunami public education programmes.
subproject.title: Enhancing Caribbean Resilience
